examples.example: 当我询问他的姓名时，他微笑着礼貌地告诉了我。

translate.english: When I asked him his name, he told me politely with a smile.

examples.example: 我很开心能记住每一位朋友的姓名，这让我们的关系更加亲密。

translate.english: I am very happy to be able to remember the name of each friend, which makes our relationship closer.

examples.example: 每次认识新朋友，我都会认真记住他们的姓名，这是对他们的尊重。

translate.english: Every time I meet new friends, I will carefully remember their names, which is respect for them.
